title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package' occurs when selecting 'xxx' as the destination in the 'jdt.ui3' package of 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' module.
OB: When 'xxx' is selected as the destination in the 'copy package' process for the 'jdt.ui3' package of the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' module, a package named 'ui' is incorrectly included in the copied result.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the 'jdt.ui3' package in the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' module. 
2. Initiate the 'copy package' action. 
3. Select 'xxx' as the destination. 
4. Complete the 'copy package' process. 
5. Observe the copied result and verify if the package 'ui' is mistakenly included.
